hu.szabot.transloadit

Class Transloadit

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.szabot.transloadit.Transloadit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITransloadit

    public class Transloadit
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITransloadit
    Handles whole data transfer procedures between Your Application and Transloadit

    • Field Detail

      • key

        private java.lang.String key
        The API Key of the current Transloadit user. This key is used for each Transloadit request

      • secret

        private java.lang.String secret
        The API Secret code of the current Transloadit user. This code is used for each request if signature authentication is enabled

    • Constructor Detail

        public Transloadit(java.lang.String key)
        Creates a new Transloadit object with the given key
        Parameters:
        key - The API key

    • Method Detail

      • useSignature

        public void useSignature(java.lang.String secret)
        Description copied from interface: ITransloadit
        Sets API Secret code of the current Transloadit user. This code is used for each request if signature authentication is enabled
        Specified by:
        useSignature in interface ITransloadit
        Parameters:
        secret - The secret key, or NULL to not use signature.

      • deleteAssembly

        Description copied from interface: ITransloadit
        Tries to delete an assembly by the specified assembly ID.
        Specified by:
        deleteAssembly in interface ITransloadit
        Parameters:
        assemblyID - ID of the assembly which will be tried to be deleted
        Returns:
        Represents the whole result of the request.

      • getBoredInstance

        private java.lang.String getBoredInstance()

      • invokeAssembly

        public TransloaditResponse invokeAssembly(IAssemblyBuilder assembly)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: ITransloadit
        Tries to create the specified assembly on Transloadit. Bored instance is requested at first. If there is one, then it will be used to proceed the request, which can be completed on a bored instance.
        Specified by:
        invokeAssembly in interface ITransloadit
        Parameters:
        assembly - Specified assembly which will be tried to be created.
        Returns:
        Represents the whole result of the request.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • requestAndExecute

        public TransloaditResponse requestAndExecute(TransloaditRequest request)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: ITransloadit
        Creates then tries to proceed the specified or a default request, then executes this and gets the response of it.
        Specified by:
        requestAndExecute in interface ITransloadit
        Parameters:
        request - Optional request which will be tried to be executed
        Returns:
        Represents the whole result of the request.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown when I/O error occurred in the communication.

      • getSignature

        private java.lang.String getSignature(java.lang.String str)
        Generates and gets the signature of the current request (based on the API Secret code and "params" field)
        Parameters:
        str - Specified "params" field of the current Transloadit request
        Returns:
        SHA1 signature for the current request
